_source.text: A computer program was written to determine objectively and consistently whether the total flux density of each source is better represented by the baseline zero-crossing method f ( z ), the value integrated within the nominal IRAS detector size f ( t ), the point source template fit amplitude ("template"), or the peak flux in the profile ("peak").

text: density of each source **is** **better** represented by the baseline **zero**-crossing method f ( z ), the value
integrated within the nominal IRAS detector size f ( t ), the point source template fit **amplitude** ("template"), or the peak flux in the profile ("peak").
